content.rendered:
Westeros was once ruled by dragon kings, but the Targaryen dynasty was expelled 15 years ago and is now ruled by Robert Baratheon with the help of his loyal friends, Jon Arryn and then Eddard Stark. At the heart of the conflict are the Lords of Deres, the Starks. They are like the land where they were born: a stubborn, tough family. The story of heroes, villains and an evil power comes to life before our eyes. But we must soon realize that in this world, good and evil are not simply confronted, but that characteristically portrayed unfolds before us with various desires, purposes, fears, and wounds.”

Seasons: 8 (2011-2019)

Status: Finished

Creators: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss

Channel: HBO

Starring: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington
